data.current_description: Send SMS  to recipients using D7 SMS Gateway
data.description_suggestion: Sends an SMS message to one or more recipients through the D7 SMS Gateway. Accepts a SendSMSRequest containing message content and recipient phone numbers. Returns a response with delivery status and message ID for tracking. Requires authentication. Consumes account balance based on message count and destination.
data.reasoning: Summary lacks proper formatting and action clarity. Description is incomplete - missing details about request schema structure, response format, authentication requirement, and balance consumption side effect. Enhanced version provides AI agents with clear understanding of inputs, outputs, and state changes.

data.current_description: Send Bulk SMS  to multiple recipients using D7 SMS Gateway
data.summary_suggestion: Send bulk SMS to multiple recipients
data.description_suggestion: Sends SMS messages in bulk to multiple recipients through the D7 SMS Gateway. Accepts a BulkSMSRequest containing message content and recipient lists. Returns delivery status and message IDs for each recipient for tracking purposes. Requires authentication. Consumes account balance proportional to the number of messages sent and their destinations.
data.reasoning: Summary lacks action verb clarity. Description is vague about request/response structure and missing critical details about authentication, balance consumption, and tracking capabilities. Improved version clarifies the bulk operation nature, specifies schema usage, and explains side effects for AI agent understanding of when and how to use this operation.
